projects.title: Local Weather
projects.description: This app is designed to view local weather for current day, next 3 days, and next 5 days...
projects.technologiesUsed: API, jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github

projects.title: Movie Maker
projects.description: This app is created to help movie producer determine if they will be able to make a movie given a certain budget and movie elements of choosing.
projects.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github

projects.title: Ex-Tracker
projects.description: This app is designed to avoid running into ex, so it needs to display a comprehensive list of all locations that ex frequents.
projects.technologiesUsed: API, jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github

projects.title: Quick-Quote
projects.description: This app is designed to help customers place new orders, manage existing orders, and analyze purchases easily. It is a mini version of e-commerce app.
projects.technologiesUsed: API, jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS, React and Version Control with Github

projects.title: Study-Tracker
projects.description: This app is designed help my girl-friend track her daily study time. She can clock in and clock out to log her time. Once clock out, the time she spent will be accumulated on top of previous time. She can then allocate time to each subject she studied each day.
projects.technologiesUsed: API, jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS, React and Version Control with Github
